# src/types
This directory defines core TypeScript interfaces, including `ExcludedFile` for file exclusion details, `DiscoveryResult` for file discovery outcomes, and `DiscoveryStats` for reporting discovery metrics.

## Contents
- [`index.ts`](./index.ts): Defines interfaces `ExcludedFile`, `DiscoveryResult`, and `DiscoveryStats` used for file discovery and reporting.
